protein.general_function: Involved in transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: On ligand binding, forms a receptor complex consisting of two type II and two type I transmembrane serine/threonine kinases. Type II receptors phosphorylate and activate type I receptors which autophosphorylate, then bind and activate SMAD transcriptional regulators. Phosphorylates TTRAP

go_class.description: transforming growth factor beta receptor activity
receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
